title: Parsing Pipeline v1
description: Pure Markdown-to-ParsedNote transformation covering frontmatter, headings, tags, aliases, links, embeds, person mentions, and plain-text extraction.

title: Incremental update handling with deltas
description: Handle file create/modify/delete/rename events, compute deltas between ParsedNotes, and update tag/heading/people/graph/search/unlinked indices efficiently.

title: Resolution API surface for links and embeds
description: Expose resolveLinkRef/resolveEmbedRef results with structured status for indexing and UI, including ambiguous candidate lists.

title: Add UI component tests with React Testing Library
Person mention resolution
description: Normalize @Person strings, look up PeopleIndex by name, handle unresolved/new person cases, and propagate rename impacts.

title: Graph node/edge store and adjacency maintenance
description: Implement GraphIndex nodes/outgoing/incoming maps, add/remove edge helpers, and node lifecycle handling for deletes/updates.

title: Vault discovery and path normalization
description: Enumerate vault .md files, normalize paths to NoteId/PersonId conventions, and expose a canonical vault tree for downstream systems.

title: Document development and build workflows
description: Create developer documentation covering: monorepo structure, package responsibilities, development commands (bun run dev), build process (bun run build), and contribution guidelines.

title: Link & Entity Resolution Engine
description: Resolve [[note]]/[[note#heading]], ![[embed]], and @Person references using title/alias lookup, heading anchors, and person registries with ambiguity handling.

title: Add unit tests for Core Engine subsystems
Minimal markdown-native editor & command palette
description: Deliver the minimal white-canvas editor with live markdown rendering and command palette control surface; covers dual-layer typing surface, parser worker, reveal-on-cursor rendering, palette, and save/load integration.

title: Dual-layer editor shell with selection tracking
description: Build the blank white canvas with contentEditable input surface plus read-only overlay, synced scroll/line spacing, and selection-to-offset tracking so typing stays aligned with rendered text.

title: Parser worker emits inline token spans
description: Run parser in a worker, emit inline token spans with offsets/markers for emphasis/strong/code/links/headings/lists, debounce updates, and expose a render-ready token stream.

title: Reveal-on-cursor markdown rendering
description: Implement render model that hides markdown markers in non-active spans, reveals raw markdown around the caret/selection, and keeps overlay/text aligned during live typing with graceful plain-markdown fallback.

title: Load/save flow and CoreClient hooks
description: Wire CoreClient getNote/load into the editor buffer, add updateNoteContent RPC + autosave/debounce/blur handling, surface non-blocking save errors, and preserve blank-canvas feel during loads.

title: Command palette (cmd+k) for navigation and actions
description: Implement keyboard-first command palette overlay with registry, global cmd+k binding, note search/open via CoreClient search/listNotes, and hooks for editor actions (toggle preview modes, new note).

title: Minimal styling and motion polish
description: Set typography, spacing, caret-color, and palette overlay visuals to maintain the white-canvas aesthetic; add lightweight fade/slide for palette and active-span transitions without introducing chrome.

title: Performance throttling and fallback coverage
description: Profile typing/render loop, tune debounce/raf scheduling for overlay updates, and add tests/fallback behavior when worker parsing fails so editor gracefully reverts to plain markdown.

title: Create optional CLI app
description: Implement apps/cli for debugging Core Engine, scripting batch operations, and exporting/transforming notes. This is optional and lower priority.

title: Transactional state updates and notifications
description: Wrap index mutations per file event in transactions, publish updated snapshots or change events, and gate UI readiness on minimum indexing completion.

title: Data Model & Registries Foundation
description: Define core identifiers and in-memory indices for notes, people, tags, folders, headings, embeds, and unlinked mentions per architecture data model.

title: Graph query and filtering APIs
description: Implement neighbor/backlink retrieval with edge-type and direction filters, plus helpers for tag-, person-, and folder-centric subviews for the UI.

title: Build Core Engine main package
description: Implement packages/core-engine as a standalone JSON-RPC server that runs as a child process. Include IPC message routing, service integration (parsing, indexing, graph, search), state management, and entrypoint (index.ts).

title: Filesystem watch and change notification
description: Set up watcher for create/modify/delete/rename, debounce bursts, and emit normalized events to the Indexing System.

title: Implement Core Engine subsystem packages
description: Create packages: parser (markdown to AST, frontmatter, links, mentions, tags), indexing (registries for notes/people/tags/backlinks), search (fuzzy + full-text), graph (construction, adjacency maps), resolution (link/person/tag resolution), file-watcher (OS file watching with debouncing).

title: Note link resolution with titles and aliases
description: Implement resolveNoteLink handling path hints, normalized title lookup, alias match, ambiguous candidate reporting, and unresolved creation hooks.

title: Create core-client API wrapper
description: Implement packages/core-client as a typed TypeScript API wrapper for the UI. Hide IPC/RPC complexity behind simple methods like search(), getNote(), updateNoteContent().

title: Set up Electron desktop app structure
description: Create apps/desktop with main process, preload scripts, and Core Engine spawn/management logic. Implement IPC bridge between Electron main and Core Engine child process using JSON-RPC.

title: People and unlinked mention indices
description: Implement PeopleIndex (people registry plus mention maps) and UnlinkedMentionIndex data holders prepared for recomputation passes.

title: Install and configure Bun test runner
Tag/Folder/Heading/Embed index structures
description: Implement TagIndex, FolderIndex, HeadingIndex, and EmbedIndex maps/sets with add/update/remove and lookup helpers as per data model.

title: Add integration tests for IPC communication
Create shared packages: domain-model and utils
description: Implement packages/domain-model with all shared types (ParsedNote, NoteId, PersonId, TagId, GraphNode, GraphEdge, SearchResultItem, Commands). Create packages/utils for shared helper functions.

title: Indexing System & App State
description: Eager startup indexing, incremental file-change handling, registry coordination, and atomic state publication for the knowledge graph app.

title: Edge construction from parsed notes
description: Generate typed edges for folder, tag, person mentions, links, embeds, and heading targets using resolved references and ensure node creation helpers.

title: Plain-text extraction and ParsedNote assembly
description: Convert Markdown to plain text for search/unlinked mentions, assemble ParsedNote object, and enforce tolerant error handling for malformed input.

title: Body parsing for headings, tags, links, embeds, mentions
description: Scan Markdown body (regex/AST hybrid) to extract headings with anchors, inline/frontmatter tags, aliases, [[links]]/![[embeds]], and @person mentions with positions.

title: AppState aggregation and read APIs
description: Assemble AppState composed of all indices, expose read-only accessors, and ensure consistency invariants used by UI/graph/search layers.

title: Vault Manager & Runtime Flow
description: File-based vault abstraction: directory discovery, normalized path mapping, and filesystem watch events for create/modify/delete/rename feeding downstream systems.

title: Implement monorepo tech stack and project structure
description: Set up the complete Turborepo monorepo with TypeScript, Bun, Electron, React, and all required packages as defined in the architecture document. This includes the Core Engine, UI layer, IPC communication, and development workflow.

title: Frontmatter parsing and title resolution
description: Extract YAML frontmatter, tolerate parse failures, compute frontmatterTitle/h1Title/resolvedTitle precedence, and capture raw frontmatter string.

title: Set up build and packaging pipeline
description: Configure Turborepo build pipeline with proper dependency ordering. Set up Electron builder to package main process, renderer bundle, and Core Engine binary into distributable desktop app.

title: Implement development workflow tooling
description: Create dev.sh script to orchestrate concurrent dev servers (Core Engine watch mode, Electron main with reload, Vite dev server). Configure Turborepo dev task as persistent and non-cached.

title: Startup vault indexing pipeline
description: Orchestrate initial scan of vault .md files, parallel parse jobs, register ParsedNotes across indices, and run post-processing for resolution/unlinked mentions.

title: Heading resolution for [[Note#Heading]]
description: Resolve heading anchors after note resolution using normalized heading ids, returning resolved/ambiguous/unresolved status for graph edges.

title: Note registry with titles and aliases
description: Build NoteRegistry maps (byId, byPath, byTitle, byAlias) with add/update/remove operations and alias/title recomputation hooks.

title: Set up monorepo foundation and configuration
description: Initialize Turborepo monorepo structure with root package.json, Bun configuration, and shared config packages (tsconfig, eslint, prettier). Set up Turborepo pipeline configuration.

title: Graph Engine & Query APIs
description: Typed node/edge model for notes, people, tags, folders, headings, and embeds with adjacency maintenance and query helpers for neighbors/backlinks/subviews.

title: Canonical IDs and normalization utilities
description: Implement NoteId/PersonId/TagId/FolderId normalization rules and helpers including heading anchors and node ID prefixes.

title: Vault mutation APIs for notes and people
description: Provide create/rename/delete helpers that maintain normalized paths, optionally special-casing people/ folder moves, and surface errors consistently.

title: Add testing infrastructure
description: Set up test runners and configure Turborepo test task. Add unit tests for Core Engine subsystems, integration tests for IPC communication, and UI component tests.

title: Build React UI renderer with Vite
description: Create apps/desktop/renderer with React UI shell, Vite configuration for fast bundling, and integration with core-client for communicating with Core Engine.
